```{r deathratesage, echo = F, results = "asis", eval = T}

files <- list.files(path = "plots/", 
                    pattern = "*_mix_age.png$",
                    full.names = TRUE)

for(i in 1:length(files)) {
  
  name <- str_remove(files[i], "plots/")
  name <- str_remove(name, "_mix_age.png")
  name <- str_replace_all(name, "_", " ")
  
  cat(paste0("\n\n# ", name, "\n\n"))
    
  cat('![](', paste0(files[i]), ')')
}
```  
